objective: Test Objective : 6.7.9 Supported Number of Gateways

steps.description: Record the method of configuring network layer addresses on the Layer 3 switch (routing port configuration or VLANInterface method).
Record the number of gateways that can be configured on the Layer 3 switch
Build the test environment according to Figure 10

tester port1 address is 192.168.9.100/24, port2 address is 192.168.11.100/24; DUT port1 and port2 are configured as gateways for 192.168.9.0 and 192.168.11.0 subnets respectively, and sample verification is performed to check if the gateways are configured successfully.
